dc:title: On Pilgrimage - April 1965
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Tender account of the death of a friend's father. Details of a long trip through the West and Midwest. Comments on the civil rights struggle, war in Vietnam, and farm labor issues. Visits Ammon Hennacy in Salt Lake City.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 825 1965-04-02 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
